benchmark_details.name: ETR-fr
benchmark_details.overview: ETR-fr is the first dataset specifically designed for Easy-to-Read (ETR) text generation, tailored to users with cognitive disabilities. It consists of 523 aligned text pairs fully compliant with European ETR guidelines.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance accessibility and facilitate understanding for individuals with cognitive impairments through the provision of ETR-compliant texts.
audience: Developers of AI-driven text simplification tools

data.source: ETR book collection published by Fran√ßois Baudez Publishing.
data.annotation: Aligned by experts based on European ETR guidelines.

methods: Parameter-efficient fine-tuning of PLMs and LLMs
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance of models on the ETR-fr test set.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in ROUGE metrics indicate better quality in text generation.
methodology.validation: Internal evaluations using automatic metrics and manual assessments according to ETR guidelines.
